```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("dplyr")
library("tidyverse")
library("lubridate")

getwd()
Sap1<-read.csv("../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/Regressed/Sap1.csv")
Sap2<-read.csv("../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/Regressed/Sap2.csv")
Sap3<-read.csv("../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/Regressed/Sap3.csv")
Sap4<-read.csv("../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/Regressed/Sap4.csv")

Sap1$Date<-as.Date(Sap1$Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")
Sap2$Date<-as.Date(Sap2$Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")
Sap3$Date<-as.Date(Sap3$Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")
Sap4$Date<-as.Date(Sap4$Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")

Sap1<-Sap1%>%mutate_if(is.character, as.numeric)
Sap2<-Sap2%>%mutate_if(is.character, as.numeric)
Sap3<-Sap3%>%mutate_if(is.character, as.numeric)
Sap4<-Sap4%>%mutate_if(is.character, as.numeric)
```

```{r 24hr}
Sap1.24<-aggregate(Sap1[,c(5,7:38)], by = list(Sap1$Date, Sap1$DOY),FUN = "sum")%>%
  mutate(Interval = "24hr")%>%
  select(1,2,36,3:35)
names(Sap1.24)[1]<-"Date"
names(Sap1.24)[2]<-"DOY"

Sap2.24<-aggregate(Sap2[,c(5,7:38)], by = list(Sap2$Date, Sap2$DOY),FUN = "sum")%>%
  mutate(Interval = "24hr")%>%
  select(1,2,36,3:35)
names(Sap2.24)[1]<-"Date"
names(Sap2.24)[2]<-"DOY"

Sap3.24<-aggregate(Sap3[,c(5,7:38)], by = list(Sap3$Date, Sap3$DOY),FUN = "sum")%>%
  mutate(Interval = "24hr")%>%
  select(1,2,36,3:35)
names(Sap3.24)[1]<-"Date"
names(Sap3.24)[2]<-"DOY"

Sap4.24<-aggregate(Sap4[,c(5,7:38)], by = list(Sap4$Date, Sap4$DOY),FUN = "sum")%>%
  mutate(Interval = "24hr")%>%
  select(1,2,36,3:35)
names(Sap4.24)[1]<-"Date"
names(Sap4.24)[2]<-"DOY"
```

```{r assign dn}
Sap1.cat<-Sap1%>%
  mutate( cut(Sap1$Time,breaks = c(-1,630, 2000,Inf), labels = c("Night", "Daytime", "Night")))
names(Sap1.cat)[39]<-"Cat"

Sap2.cat<-Sap2%>%
  mutate( cut(Sap2$Time,breaks = c(-1,630, 2000,Inf), labels = c("Night", "Daytime", "Night")))
names(Sap2.cat)[39]<-"Cat"

Sap3.cat<-Sap3%>%
  mutate( cut(Sap3$Time,breaks = c(-1,630, 2000,Inf), labels = c("Night", "Daytime", "Night")))
names(Sap3.cat)[39]<-"Cat"

Sap4.cat<-Sap4%>%
  mutate( cut(Sap4$Time,breaks = c(-1,630, 2000,Inf), labels = c("Night", "Daytime", "Night")))
names(Sap4.cat)[39]<-"Cat"
```

```{r sum dn}
Sap1.dn<-aggregate(Sap1.cat[,c(5,7:38)], by = list(Sap1.cat$Date,Sap1.cat$DOY, Sap1.cat$Cat),FUN = "sum")
names(Sap1.dn)[1]<-"Date"
names(Sap1.dn)[2]<-"DOY"
names(Sap1.dn)[3]<-"Interval"


Sap2.dn<-aggregate(Sap2.cat[,c(5,7:38)], by = list(Sap2.cat$Date,Sap2.cat$DOY, Sap2.cat$Cat),FUN = "sum")
names(Sap2.dn)[1]<-"Date"
names(Sap2.dn)[2]<-"DOY"
names(Sap2.dn)[3]<-"Interval"


Sap3.dn<-aggregate(Sap3.cat[,c(5,7:38)], by = list(Sap3.cat$Date,Sap3.cat$DOY, Sap3.cat$Cat),FUN = "sum")
names(Sap3.dn)[1]<-"Date"
names(Sap3.dn)[2]<-"DOY"
names(Sap3.dn)[3]<-"Interval"

Sap4.dn<-aggregate(Sap4.cat[,c(5,7:38)], by = list(Sap4.cat$Date,Sap4.cat$DOY, Sap4.cat$Cat),FUN = "sum")
names(Sap4.dn)[1]<-"Date"
names(Sap4.dn)[2]<-"DOY"
names(Sap4.dn)[3]<-"Interval"
```

```{r combine}
Sap1.Sum<-rbind(Sap1.24,Sap1.dn)
Sap2.Sum<-rbind(Sap2.24,Sap2.dn)
Sap3.Sum<-rbind(Sap3.24,Sap3.dn)
Sap4.Sum<-rbind(Sap4.24,Sap4.dn)

write.csv(Sap1.Sum, row.names = FALSE, file ="../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/RegressedSums/Sap1.Sum.csv")
write.csv(Sap2.Sum, row.names = FALSE, file ="../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/RegressedSums/Sap2.Sum.csv")
write.csv(Sap3.Sum, row.names = FALSE, file ="../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/RegressedSums/Sap3.Sum.csv")
write.csv(Sap4.Sum, row.names = FALSE, file ="../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/RegressedSums/Sap4.Sum.csv")
```

```{r conversion}
getwd()
Sum1<-read.csv("../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/RegressedSums/Regressed/Sap1.Sum.csv")
Sum2<-read.csv("../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/RegressedSums/Regressed/Sap2.Sum.csv")
Sum3<-read.csv("../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/RegressedSums/Regressed/Sap3.Sum.csv")
Sum4<-read.csv("../Data/Processed/Gap-Filled/RegressedSums/Regressed/Sap4.Sum.csv")

library(dplyr)
Converted1<- Sum1 %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(5:36),
            .funs = funs((.*15*60) /1000))

Converted2<- Sum2 %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(5:36),
            .funs = funs((.*15*60) /1000))

Converted3<- Sum3 %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(5:36),
            .funs = funs((.*15*60) /1000))

Converted4<- Sum4 %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(5:36),
            .funs = funs((.*15*60) /1000))

write.csv(Converted1, row.names = FALSE, file ="../Data/Processed/Sums/Converted/Converted1.csv")
write.csv(Converted2, row.names = FALSE, file ="../Data/Processed/Sums/Converted/Converted2.csv")
write.csv(Converted3, row.names = FALSE, file ="../Data/Processed/Sums/Converted/Converted3.csv")
write.csv(Converted4, row.names = FALSE, file ="../Data/Processed/Sums/Converted/Converted4.csv")



```
